headline: Trimble (TRMB) Margin Drop to 8% Challenges Bullish Long-Term Profit Growth Narratives
summary: Trimble (TRMB) posted annual earnings growth of 23.2% over the past five years, outpacing peers. However, this year’s numbers showed a sharp turn. Net profit margins compressed significantly from 40.7% to 8%, and the company saw negative earnings growth for the most recent period, despite a robust 18.5% forecasted annual earnings growth moving forward. With shares trading at $80.57, well below the estimated fair value of $164.82, investors are weighing strong long-term earnings trends and the...
